properties.Text: You can use the slider to control drawing thickness. You can reset all settings to default by clicking on the "Reset Settings" button.
properties.children: You can use the slider to control drawing thickness. You can reset all settings to default by clicking on the "Reset Settings" button.

properties.Text: DoodleNow is an easy-to-use drawing app with a variety of functions.
properties.children: DoodleNow is an easy-to-use drawing app with a variety of functions.
